author: Saphora Smith and Lidia Sirna and Hernan Muñoz Ratto and Paul Goldman
title: WHO concerned by 'rapid escalation' of virus, as U.S. death toll nears 5,000
description: The head of the World Health Organization has voiced deep concern over the “rapid escalation” of the coronavirus, as the United States nears 5,000 deaths.
content:
The head of the World Health Organization has voiced deep concern over the rapid escalation and global spread of the new coronavirus pandemic, as the United States nears a grim milestone of 5,000 deaths.
Over the past five weeks, we have witnessed a near exp… [+3251 chars]
